DOC.HEADLINE: FOR THE RECORD
DOC.TEXT: Palme d ' Or -- A Sept . 11 article about director Quentin Tarantino incorrectly reported the number of American films that have won the Palme d ' Or at the Cannes Film Festival . As reader Steve Barr points_out , 13 American films have won or shared the honor : " Marty " ( 1955 ) , " Friendly Persuasion " ( 1957 ) , " MASH " ( 1970 ) , " Scarecrow " ( 1973 ) , " The Conversation " ( 1974 ) , " Taxi Driver " ( 1976 ) , " All That Jazz " ( 1980 ) , " Missing " ( 1982 ) , " Paris , Texas " ( 1984 ) , " sex , lies and videotape " ( 1989 ) , " Wild at Heart " ( 1990 ) , " Barton Fink " ( 1991 ) and Tarantino ' s " Pulp Fiction " this year .
